definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

pinyin: Te4 li4 ni2 da2 he2 Duo1 ba1 ge1

sentences.english: In the dual-island republic, Trinidad is often seen as the mother island.
sentences.chinese: 在兩島共和國，特立尼達經常被認爲是母島。

sentences.english: A proud owner poses with his classic car in Trinidad, Cuba.
sentences.chinese: 在古巴特立尼達市一位車主自豪地與他的老爺車合影。

sentences.english: In Trinidad, I proposed an Energy and Climate Partnership for the Americas.
sentences.chinese: 在特立尼達，我提出了美洲國家能源和氣候合作計劃。

sentences.english: Bissell renewed the case for the Trinidad plan.
sentences.chinese: 比斯爾及陳述了採用特立尼達計劃的理由。

sentences.english: Trinidad was founded by natives that came from the mission of San Carlos.
sentences.chinese: 特立尼達是由來自聖卡洛斯教會的本地人建造的。
